headline.print_headline: Walt Disney, Shanghai Media Group to Develop Disney-Branded Movies
headline.main: Walt Disney, Shanghai Media Group to Develop Disney-Branded Movies

docs.snippet: Walt Disney Studios has signed an agreement with Shanghai Media Group Pictures to develop Disney-branded movies, the latest move by a U.S. studio to grow its presence in China's entertainment business....
docs.lead_paragraph: Walt Disney Studios has signed an agreement with Shanghai Media Group Pictures to develop Disney-branded movies, the latest move by a U.S. studio to grow its presence in China's entertainment business.

headline.print_headline: Bitcoin True Believers Unfazed by Losses in Mt. Gox Collapse
headline.main: Bitcoin True Believers Unfazed by Losses in Mt. Gox Collapse

docs.snippet: Like other bitcoin evangelists, Ken Shishido is ready to write off the money he lost in the bankruptcy of Tokyo-based virtual currency exchange Mt. Gox as the price of revolutionizing global finance....
docs.lead_paragraph: Like other bitcoin evangelists, Ken Shishido is ready to write off the money he lost in the bankruptcy of Tokyo-based virtual currency exchange Mt. Gox as the price of revolutionizing global finance.

headline.main: Free Options for Filing Your Income Tax Return Electronically

docs.snippet: For low- and moderate-income taxpayers, commercial software companies provide free online tax software. But anyone can use the I.R.S.’s online forms....

headline.print_headline: Richards Has Winner in Kings' 3-1 Win Over Jets
headline.main: Richards Has Winner in Kings' 3-1 Win Over Jets

docs.snippet: Mike Richards scored the winner on a Winnipeg Jets' giveaway to lift the Los Angeles Kings to a 3-1 win Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mike Richards scored the winner on a Winnipeg Jets' giveaway to lift the Los Angeles Kings to a 3-1 win Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Philippine Town Vice Mayor Freed by Kidnappers
headline.main: Philippine Town Vice Mayor Freed by Kidnappers

docs.snippet: A southern Philippine town vice mayor who was reportedly abducted outside a shopping mall earlier this week has been released, police said Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A southern Philippine town vice mayor who was reportedly abducted outside a shopping mall earlier this week has been released, police said Friday.

headline.print_headline: Man Lauded as Japan Beethoven Sorry for Fake Work
headline.main: Man Lauded as Japan Beethoven Sorry for Fake Work

docs.snippet: The man once lauded as "Japan's Beethoven" bowed repeatedly and apologized Friday at his first media appearance since it was revealed last month that his famed musical compositions were ghostwritten and he wasn't completely deaf....
docs.lead_paragraph: The man once lauded as "Japan's Beethoven" bowed repeatedly and apologized Friday at his first media appearance since it was revealed last month that his famed musical compositions were ghostwritten and he wasn't completely deaf.

headline.print_headline: Teheran, Zimmermann Each Throw 3 Scoreless Innings
headline.main: Teheran, Zimmermann Each Throw 3 Scoreless Innings

docs.snippet: Julio Teheran worked around six base runners to match Jordan Zimmermann with three scoreless innings and lead the Atlanta Braves to a 3-2 win over the Atlanta Braves on Thursday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Julio Teheran worked around six base runners to match Jordan Zimmermann with three scoreless innings and lead the Atlanta Braves to a 3-2 win over the Atlanta Braves on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: SEC Scores Partial Win in Insider Trading Case Over 2009 Sanofi Deal
headline.main: SEC Scores Partial Win in Insider Trading Case Over 2009 Sanofi Deal

docs.snippet: Federal securities regulators have won a partial victory against two brothers accused of trading on inside information in 2009 about French pharmaceutical company Sanofi's plan to buy a Tennessee-based company....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal securities regulators have won a partial victory against two brothers accused of trading on inside information in 2009 about French pharmaceutical company Sanofi's plan to buy a Tennessee-based company.
